aidAlAdha.title: Aid Al-Adha
aidAlAdha.subtitle: Celebrate Eid by sharing joy with families in Gaza. Choose to donate: Mutton for €250, a whole Veal for €1850, or 1/7 Veal for €260. Your gift helps provide sheep or calves for sacrifice, bringing warmth and happiness to those in need.

sosGaza.title: SOS Gaza
sosGaza.subtitle: The people of Gaza are enduring relentless bombardments and humanitarian distress. Your urgent support delivers food, medical aid, and essential supplies to families in desperate need.

zakatAlMaal.title: Zakat Al-Maal
zakatAlMaal.subtitle: Fulfill your obligation and uplift lives. Zakat Al-Maal, one of Islam’s five pillars, requires giving 2.5% of savings exceeding the Nisab. Your Zakat funds critical relief efforts and sustainable aid projects.

rafahEmergency.title: Rafah Emergency
rafahEmergency.subtitle: Thousands have fled their homes in Rafah, seeking safety and shelter. Help us deliver emergency aid to displaced families in this critical time.

orphanSponsorship.title: Orphan Sponsorship
orphanSponsorship.subtitle: Make a lasting impact in a child’s life. Sponsor an orphan to provide food, education, healthcare, and a sense of belonging.

waterForGaza.title: Water for Gaza
waterForGaza.subtitle: In Gaza, over 90% of tap water is undrinkable due to extreme salinity and pollution. Groundwater contamination exceeds 96%. Help us supply clean, safe water—an essential lifeline for countless families.

charityQuotes: Give, not from abundance, but from faith — for every drop given in Allah’s name returns in oceans of mercy.
Charity extinguishes sin as water extinguishes fire — let your giving be your shield in this world and the next.
Even a smile is charity — so imagine the reward of feeding the hungry or clothing the poor.
The hands that give for the sake of Allah are never empty — they are held by angels.
On the Day of Judgment, your charity will be your shade — give today, rest tomorrow.
The believer is not truly faithful until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself — let your giving reflect that love.
The gates of Jannah are opened for those who give in secret and expect only Allah’s reward.
Allah promises: ‘Whatever you give, I will replace it’ — so fear no loss in giving to those in need.
When you give to others, you're investing in your hereafter — trade your wealth for eternal rewards.
Let your heart soften at the sight of the orphan, and your hand stretch toward the needy — for therein lies true taqwa.

whoWeAre.title: WHO ARE WE?
whoWeAre.highlight: We’re here to help Palestinian families survive—and rebuild—with dignity.

bulletPoints.sos: SOS Gaza – Emergency support and humanitarian relief for families affected by the crisis in Gaza.
bulletPoints.zakat: Zakat Al-Maal – Fulfill your annual obligation by donating your Zakat to those in need, in accordance with Islamic principles.
bulletPoints.eid: Aid Al-Adha – Share the blessings of Eid by contributing to Qurbani/Udhiya meat distribution for impoverished families.
bulletPoints.orphans: Orphan Sponsorship – Provide essential support, education, and care to orphans for a brighter and more stable future.
bulletPoints.water: Water for Gaza – Help deliver clean and safe drinking water to communities suffering from water scarcity in Gaza.
bulletPoints.ramadan: Ramadan Donations – Maximize your impact during the holy month by donating food, iftar meals, and essentials to those fasting in hardship.

whoWeAre.whyItMattersText: Every day, innocent people face unimaginable hardships. With your help, we bring relief and hope where it’s needed most.
whoWeAre.joinMovementText: Your support means everything. Together, we can build a future where every Palestinian has access to basic human rights—and a chance to thrive.

leftSection.heading: Together, we can create real change.
leftSection.paragraph1: By uniting our efforts, we can make a powerful impact on the lives of Palestinians and help them shape a brighter, more hopeful future.
leftSection.paragraph2: Your support plays a vital role in driving our mission forward. Whether through a financial donation or by offering your time as a volunteer, your involvement matters deeply.
leftSection.paragraph3: To truly make a difference, we invite you to stand with us—through giving or volunteering—because every contribution helps build a future filled with dignity and opportunity.

items.title: — Our Mission
items.text: We are dedicated to improving the daily lives of Palestinians by providing essential resources, promoting education, and restoring dignity through sustainable support.

items.title: — Our Vision
items.text: We envision a world where Palestinians can overcome adversity, reclaim their rights, and thrive in a safe, stable, and just environment.

items.title: — Our Story
items.text: SOS Palestine was founded with a single purpose: to stand in solidarity with Palestinians by offering real support, fostering resilience, and giving voice to their hopes for a better tomorrow.

text.line1: Our journey is only possible because of the compassion and dedication of our supporters.
text.line2: Together, we stand united to uplift the Palestinian people and amplify their voices.

featuresB.title: Together for Gaza – Ongoing Relief Projects

initiatives.title: Well Drilling – Bringing Clean Water to Gaza
initiatives.description: Gaza’s water infrastructure is on the brink of collapse. Countless families are forced to live without access to safe, drinkable water. Through your support, we build wells and filtration systems to deliver clean water to schools, hospitals, and devastated communities.
initiatives.urgency: One well can transform lives. Be the reason water flows again in Gaza.
highlights: Supply clean water to vital institutions

initiatives.title: Social Sponsorship – Restoring Hope for War-Affected Families
initiatives.description: War has shattered thousands of lives in Gaza, leaving families without shelter, income, or medical care. Our sponsorship program offers financial aid, food parcels, and healthcare support to widows, the injured, and families in dire need.
initiatives.urgency: Even a small act of kindness can ease their daily suffering.
benefits: Care for widows, injured, and chronically ill

initiatives.title: 🐑 Eid Sacrifice – Share Joy with Gaza’s Families
initiatives.description: For many families in Gaza, meat is a rare luxury—often only tasted once a year during Eid. With your sacrifice, we distribute fresh meat to those who need it most, turning Eid into a day of celebration, not hunger.
initiatives.urgency: Give your Qurbani for Gaza and bring smiles to grieving hearts.
supplies: Celebrate Eid with dignity and warmth

initiatives.title: Ramadan Iftars – Nourishment for the Fasting in Gaza
initiatives.description: During Ramadan, thousands in Gaza struggle to find a single meal to break their fast amidst siege and scarcity. Our team prepares and delivers hot iftar meals daily to those hit hardest by the crisis.
initiatives.urgency: Your generosity can bring a warm meal and a moment of peace to a fasting family.

initiatives.title: Orphan Sponsorship – Give Gaza’s Children a Future
initiatives.description: Conflict has robbed thousands of children in Gaza of their parents, safety, and stability. Through our orphan sponsorship program, we provide education, healthcare, and daily essentials—helping them rebuild a future filled with hope.
initiatives.urgency: Sponsor an orphan today. Be their lifeline to a brighter tomorrow.

about.title: About the association
about.name: SOS Humanistes / SOS Palestine
about.quote: “Driven by our human duty and guided by a deep faith in the justice of our cause, we work with determination to be a constant support to our Palestinian people, in Gaza and in the camps, in times of peace as in times of war.”
about.p1: Officially founded in September 2022, SOS Humanistes / SOS Palestine is based in France, with an operational office on the ground in the Gaza Strip.
about.p2: Our office in Gaza is run by an experienced local team, active 24/7, ensuring a permanent presence to respond to emergencies, manage projects, and support families without interruption.
about.p3: Although the association is administratively young, it is built on more than 13 years of real and committed humanitarian experience.
about.p4: We provide comprehensive aid: food parcels, medicines, financial assistance, children's clothing, orphan sponsorships, Ramadan campaigns, Qurbani, and emergency interventions during conflicts.
about.p5: In times of war, we intervene daily, hour by hour, thanks to our direct presence on the ground. Our team in Gaza acts immediately, while our volunteers in France mobilize the necessary resources.
about.conclusion: At SOS Humanistes / SOS Palestine, we believe that solidarity never sleeps, and that supporting Palestine is a sacred duty we fulfill with heart and determination.
